title: Nationals Hope To Win It All With Natitude
teaser: The Washington Nationals have made the playoffs for the second time in their nine years of existence.
contentencoded:
For the second time in the nine year history of the team, the Washington Nationals have made it to the playoffs.

The nation’s capital is abuzz with the team’s “Natitude” slogan found on team swag and social media, but can enthusiasm push the team beyond the first round of the playoffs and possibly to the World Series?

Here & Now‘s Jeremy Hobson speaks with Matt Bush, a reporter for WAMU, about the Nationals’ chances.

Guest

  • Matt Bush, reporter with WAMU. He tweets @MattBushMD.
